Text: The oldest national anthem, defined as "a song, as of praise, devotion, or patriotism", is the Dutch national anthem "Het Wilhelmus", which was written between 1568 and 1572, but not then given any official status.

Text: List of historical national anthems:  Some states have doubled their royal or imperial anthem as their national anthem.
